reviews.sentence: Nice place to live. The location is good and close to the Miami beach and South beach. The good thing is it provides free parking which is a benefit if you rent a car.
Beautiful bay view. Water view was exceptional ease of parking proximity to restaurant when cable did not work engineer was sent within minutes to fix it.

North Miami Beach good hotel. Room has been updated and is comfortable. Bathroom was small compared to newer hotels but still updated functional and clean. Small sitting area might have been a porch at one time and then closed in. Good value. Free parking is rare to find in Miami. Breakfast was good. Wifi worked well. Staff at check in was friendly and efficient.

Great service for great price. We were originally looking at South Beach hotels but this hotel was such a better deal. It is right on the water with great views and was a deal for the price with parking breakfast Wi Fi pool gym room had a microwave fridge and hairdyer included in the price. Most places in the south beach area charge each of those amenities separately. The gym was only a few cardio machines and I would have liked free weights. There is a restaurant Shuckers that is waterfront dining and very affordable. We stayed in the pool most days. Staff were friendly. Great trip for pleasure.

Better than what I expected. Its an excellent and very comfortable hotel. Rooms are big location is perfect its has free parking and breakfast and it has a very nice pool with an amazing view to the bay. Moreover it has a wonderful restaurant named Schuckers that you should not miss.

GO THERE. I love this hotel. I have been staying there 6 times. It is beautiful clean and confortable. A little far from South Beach for those without cars. Other than that go there. There is also a very nice restaurant directly on the water. And if you are lucky enough to own a boat you can park it right in front of the restaurant. People come from all around the city just for Shuckers. The rooms are clean and the bed mattress very confortables. You also have a pool right in the middle of the hotel facing the blue water. The only thing I wish would be a later breakfast for later sleepers who spend the night on Ocean Drive. Breakfast is served till 9 30 and it would be nice if it could be serve till 10.

Good Value for North Miami Beach. I liked the parking with no cost and the quick easy in and out. It is not a walking distance from the beach but in a good spot to use a a base to be driving around. access.

Good Value. Good location if you drive a car with no hidden costs to be around north Miami Beach. Nice quick breakfast plenty of parking space and good in and out. I believe you receive a good value for your money.
Clean facility plenty of parking and decent breakfast. Just what I was expecting.

Great Location friendly staff. We stayed here for a couple of days and loved the place. Very friendly and helpful staff. Full buffet Breakfast was included and was good. Great value for money and very conveniently located. Ample free parking was an added attraction. Would be our first choice when we visit Miami again.

Good basic accommodation. Good basic accommodation room was exactly as described. We stayed one night after flying into Miami before road trip aprox 20mins from airport. The onsite restaurant Shuckers was good and made things easier. We had top floor room giving good views of the Bay. We did not leave the hotel but I would say there did not appear to be much in the surrounding neighbourhood. People have commented that the parking was free but it was not 10 a night.
Great view good cost benefit. Coffee was good just remember wakin up early otherwise ull wait a lot for a table and refills. They charge us parking in their own parking lot.

Pleasant hotel. Nicely set up. Unfortunately i had a disagreement with hotel staff. Was charged an additional 20 for parking at the hotel. I disputed that as it had not been on my paperwofk. Only when it was obvious how upset I was with the charge was it waived. I appreciated that but a shame to go through it. Rooms pleasant but a little small for 4 people. Good location for travelling to downtown Miami. Pleasant rooms. Within good travelling distance of downtown and south beach. No local shops to buy food.

A little too expensive nice view of bay. no complimentary breakfast offered. Bathroom tiny sink intrudes on toilet and bath tub. No complimentary breakfast restaurant on property claims to be independent of BW but they cook your order in BW kitchen and walk through parking lot around to the back by restaurant. Any customer would think the food was cooked in the restaurant. but no I watched from my room terrace waiters passing each other with platters over there head. that is why my order did not come hot but cool. will not stay here again.

2 nights before cruise. First and last time we will stay at a Best Western. First the good there is a restaurant onsite for breakfast which would be convenient for most but we did not visit because we decided to drive to Denys as we did not want to encounter anymore disappointments. Now the issues these rooms are not clean by any means. Dusty lampshades and lightning fixtures awful worn furniture and inadequate towels that are so hard from wash I would not even use them on a puppy. The beds were decent for max 2 nights but pillows are awful. We were on the first floor facing the parking lot and I really did not feel safe there. Bathroom was so small only 1 person can be in there at a time and the door is so close to the bed you could literally fall of the bed and hit your head or feet on something in the bathroom. do not be fool by being on the marina almost all rooms face the street or parking lot. I am also perplexed as to why there is a charge for parking when the parking lot is right behind the building of the hotel and limited so it should be an added value for guest considering there is no other selling point to this hotel. We stayed out all day and could not wait to get on our cruise to get away from this hotel. Please look elsewhere consider a Hampton Inn Courtyard or Homewod and pay the extra per night even though you may be on a budget the way we were for this trip you will not get any value for your money.

Book a trip with orbitz. Ad said at boking Free Parking Free Breakfast Big Lie. Manager Argued even after showing web Page. Did nt even want to give Discount on breakfast or Parking that you have to PAY 100 My husband and i have used Best Western all over the Us on travels even on our stay in Manila Philippines. All offer free breakfast and free parking. Best Western is a rip off and money hole. Very Unhappy. I Would Not Recomend Anyone to stay Best Western 79st Causeway by channel 7 News Miami bch fl. In our room we found 3 Cockrouches playing around our room walls and hiding behind a picture which i do have photos. Manerger says oh that s common here on the bch. We lived on Mia. Bch 18 yrs and had no Roaches in our apt. The only nice part was house keeping was very helpful and nice and our room except Roaches seemed clean. We ate lunch next door at Shuckers. Very over rated and expensive. Advice from us living on miami bch for years is go a few blocks away to Collins ave and find Great food at good price. I Will Never stay at this Construction Site again. Parking lot with big dumpster and construction debre all over the place. The mattress you will be sleeping on are left out on. Balconies all night and placed back in the rooms. Maybe left out to clear of bedbug and Roaches. The whole place smelled of cans of Raid bug killer. Very Unhappy with Everything at our stay. Do yourself and family a favor Do nt Stay here. Better to go to Collins ave a few blks away on the beach. WORST BEST WESTERN EVER. Remember. You were Warned. Find out for yourself not a good place or deal. Never Again. BE WARNED. Breakfast 160 for plate of grease. Should have been Free. Staff there also Very Rude. W.

Worn. Ok Oscar checked us in not very friendly. Last weekend the girl was super nice. We were charged 10 for parking last weekend we were not. The AC unit sounds like a freight train. Old building needs updating very average hotel. Slow elevator. Good food in attached restaurant 13 drink 16 Po Boy 14 fish taco. Noisy area nice pool no beach near by.

Bad smelling noisy AC unit soured our stay. Renovated older hotel that was sufficient for a 1night stay at a reasonable price relatively speaking for spendy Miami Beach area. Room with two double beds was small but bed quality was good. The biggest downside was noisy smelly air conditioner unit. It put out a blast that honestly smelled like urine. do not think it was but the odor was very off putting. Maybe the unit needed a good clean. It created enough loud white noise to drown out the busy traffic sounds outside however. And if we had stayed longer I would have preferred something other than a parking lot view. All in all if you are looking to stay in the Miami Beach area it is worth spending more for a bit more quality.

Needs improvement Staff not honest. Avoid staying here if possible. Lacks cleanliness parking fees Terrible Food and NO WIFI. At first sight it did n’t seem too bad. Although the room could use a good cleaning and common areas as well … It was ok …. … It got worse as the day progressed. Onsite Restaurant prepares food in a separate building across parking lot and carries the food over to the restaurant. Grouper and Mahi were super dry. Fries were hard as a rock. Unable to eat them. Food Over cooked. Upon checkin stressed the need for WIFI Staff assured us WIFI available and provided log on info. After a long day terrible meal dip in the pool needs attention. Bathed and ready to use wifi to finish some work. NO WIFI checked for connection issues in room noticed the box behind the bed was not on at all. Behind the bed was absolutely filthy with a multi outlet power strip with dust all over it and in the outlets. Called the front desk only to be told the WIFI was out and only available in the lobby. I discovered the WIFI has been out for DAYS not just that Day. The staff told a lie at checkin. Terrible experience. Only thing the front desk offered to do was move us closer to Lobby. Really. Who wants to move late in the evening and who knows the condition of the next room. DO not stay here. Take my advice.
About Inn. Location was good. Trash in the parking lot and had to walk tru it to go to the dooms evry evening.
